content: in next st 2 double_crochet in next st* repeat *to* till end join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet dnt 42 round 4 chain 3 1 double_crochet in same st 1 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st *1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next st* repeat *to* till end join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet dnt 56 round 5 chain 3 1 double_crochet in same st 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next st *1 double_crochet in next 3 sts 2 double_crochet in next st* repeat *to* till end join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet turn 70 round 6 chain 2 1 fpdc in all sts to end join with a slip_stitch to first fpdc turn 70 round 7 first row of star stitch when you finish the last star slip_stitch to the top of beginning chain 3 turn 35 stars round 8 chain 1 second row of star stitch but instead of 1 half_double_crochet into first eye make 2 half_double_crochet in all slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet turn 35 finished stars round 9 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in all sts to end join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet turn 70 round 10 as round 6 70 round 11 chain 1 1 bpsc in same st 1 bpsc in all sts to end join with a slip_stitch to first bpsc turn 70 round 12 chain 1 1 half_double_crochet in same st 1 half_double_crochet in all sts to end join with a slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet turn 70 round 13 as round 7 35 stars round 14 as round 8 35 finished stars round 15 as round 9 dnt 70 round 16 chain 2 fpdc around first single_crochet from previous round bpdc around next st *fpdc in next st bpdc in next st* repeat *to* till end join with a slip_stitch to first fpdc dnt 70 round 17 ch2 fpdc around ch2 and first fpdc from previous round bpdc around next bpdc *fpdc in next st bpdc in next st* repeat*to* till end join with a slip_stitch to first fpdc dnt 70 round 18 as round 17 70 k a m e crochet designs 2018 by krisztina anna matejcsok-edomer all rights reserved fasten_off weave in all ends thank you for choosing the csenge anna baby cardigan and hat set for your project when you make this set i d like to see it remember to tag me @k a m e_crochet or #csengeannababycardigan on instagram if you have any questions about the pattern please contact me at matejcsokedomer krisztina@gmail com or ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/mytia89 facebook https //www facebook com/kamecrochet instagram https //www instagram com/k a m e_crochet happy crocheting k a m e crochet designs 2018 by krisztina anna matejcsok-edomer all rights reserved
